textTemplates.name: athelteTemplateDay1
textTemplates.text:
Registration is OPEN for {!$Record.Account.Name} {!$Record.KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c} Athletes and Fans!!!


Thank you so much for joining us for the meeting last night!! We are so excited to host your {!$Record.Account.Name} {!$Record.KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c} Team in {!$Record.Destination__c}!! My name is {!$Record.Account_Manager__c} and I will be the team's account manager and your main point of contact for all of the travel arrangements and accommodations. Should you have any questions or need additional information, please reach out to me directly.


As you heard, Coach has planned an exciting trip down to {!$Record.Destination__c} for the team! We hope you will join us!! 


We would like to have all Athletes and FAN Tagalongs registered in the next two weeks!


By registering as a Fan, you will receive the same trip inclusions as the players! I have included some information below to help get everyone started. 



The link below will take you to our Video page where you can see several videos of all of the exciting things the team and families will have a chance to participate in on your trip! 





Player Registration Instructions: Please follow the steps below to complete your players’ registration online. If you have any issues completing this, please feel free to contact me any time.


Tag A-long Information: Families are invited to join the team in Orlando as well!! This is a wonderful opportunity to come cheer the team on AND make it a family vacation! “Tag A-longs” are offered the same inclusions and pricing as the team — you essentially get to travel alongside the team! Families will also have the opportunity to fly with the team! To register your family for the trip, please follow the same steps as registering your athlete, but choose “Fan Reservation” and applicable room occupancy rate for number of people staying in your room.


An initial deposit of $400 per person is due for all Athletes and Fan Tagalongs. Please have yourself (and any other FAN Tagalongs) registered as soon as possible so that their spot is guaranteed.


How do I register to participate?


1. Click on the link to the site: https://ksaevents.net/

2. Click on “Register” at the top of the page

3. Click on Athlete Registration to register your athlete (KSA Events | Athlete Registration) or Fan Reservation to register friends & family (KSA Events | Fan Reservations)

4. Fill out the registration. **Webcode is {!$Record.GL_Webcode__c}

5. Enter credit card information and deposit amount

6. Review Terms & Conditions

7. Click “Register” Button

8. You are all set! You will receive an email confirmation within 24 hours with your receipt and invoice.


We hope you will join us to cheer on the team!!

textTemplates.name: bounceTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Sales_Manager__r.FirstName} {!$Record.Sales_Manager__r.LastName}



{!$Record.School_Contact__r.FirstName} {!$Record.School_Contact__r.LastName} traveling with {!$Record.School_Contact__r.Account.Name} has a confirmed bounced email address. We have stopped all further marketing emails until the email address has been updated.
